summary.span: Represents a collection of objects.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會封裝有關應用程式的安全性決策。 objects encapsulate security decisions about an application.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所包含的物件`trusts`會附加至集合結尾。The objects contained in `trusts` are appended to the end of the collection. 您可以使用方法，以快速將應用程式信任物件的另一個集合加入的集合，而不是以手動方式加入集合的每個應用程式信任方法。You can use the method to quickly add another collection of application trust objects to the collection instead of manually adding each application trust to the collection using the method. 若要移除您先前新增的應用程式信任的範圍，請使用方法。To remove a range of application trusts that you previously added, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作介面，可讓您在集合中移動。The implements the interface that allows you to move within a collection. 使用屬性取得目前的項目指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，將列舉程式移至其初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to its initial position. > [!NOTE] > 您建立列舉值，或使用之後重新定位到集合中，開頭的列舉值的方法然後您必須呼叫放置第一個項目列舉值的方法。After you create the enumerator, or use the method to reposition the enumerator to the start of the collection, you must then call the method to position the enumerator to the first item. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋整個集合，並在移除指定的應用程式信任的所有執行個體。The entire collection is searched, and all instances of the specified application trust are removed. 請遵循移除的物件的物件會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 移動物件的索引也會更新。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
